newsitem.title: FRANCE: Eurotunnel traffic to resume in few days.
newsitem.headline: Eurotunnel traffic to resume in few days.

text.p: Eurotunnel said on Tuesday that passenger shuttle services and Eurostar traffic could resume "between now and several days on part of five-sixths of the tunnel".
But managing director Alain Bertrand said it would take "three to five months" to complete repairs on the stretch of tunnel damaged by fire last week.

"I think that, for Eurostar and the tourist shuttles, we can have a resumption soon, in several days and long before the end of the work," he said. "A period of three to five months seems realistic for the work given the current state of our analyses."
